Chika 1:31 AM Slack Technologies, Inc. (originally Tiny Speck) is a computer software startup founded in 2009, with personnel located in Vancouver, San Francisco and Dublin. The core team is largely drawn from the founders of Ludicorp, the company that created Flickr. Slack is the fastest company to receive a billion dollar valuation.
